scripts.start: SET NODE_ENV=production&& cd server && npm install && node ./src/index.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.client: SET NODE_ENV=development&& cd client && npm start
scripts.server: SET NODE_ENV=development&& cd server && npm start
scripts.prod: SET NODE_ENV=production&& cd server && npm start
